code: @Override @Before public void setUp() throws Exception {     super.setUp().     prepareFtpServer(). }

@Test public void testSendFileTargetFileExist() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint mock = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     mock.expectedMessageCount(1).     mock.expectedBodiesReceived("Hello Again World").     mock.expectedFileExists(FTP_ROOT_DIR + "/tempfile/foo/bar/message.txt", "Hello Again World").     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello Again World").     mock.assertIsSatisfied(). }

private void prepareFtpServer() throws Exception {     // prepares the FTP Server by creating a file on the server     Endpoint endpoint = context.getEndpoint(getFtpUrl()).     Exchange exchange = endpoint.createExchange().     exchange.getIn().setBody("Hello World").     exchange.getIn().setHeader(Exchange.FILE_NAME, "foo/bar/message.txt").     Producer producer = endpoint.createProducer().     producer.start().     producer.process(exchange).     producer.stop().     // assert file is created     File file = new File(FTP_ROOT_DIR + "/tempfile/foo/bar/message.txt").     assertTrue("The file should exists", file.exists()). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").to(getFtpUrl()).to("mock:result").         }     }. }
